reviewText: If you are Top Gear Fan, you will probably like this.
Clarkson, as usual, you are FANTASTIC...such dry English humour.  Show would be NOTHING without the three boys...such boys.
Jeremy Clarkson is the man, good fun to watch, just like TG UK.  same as TG less RH and JM

I have been a fan of top gear for many years and this dvd sticks to the humor and basics of how the show normally works. Just think of this dvd as multiple head-to-head reviews taken from a top gear episode. If you are a fan of top gear you will not be disappointed with this dvd.
a very funny dvd on supercars if you like jeremy clarkson and supercars  or supercars and humor combined i recomend it
